package.name: self_camera_calibration
package.description:
This package finds the mutual position and orientation between a camera and the base link of HyQ. It uses the forward kinematics and a special foot design, which has attached a ChAruCo marker on it.
The transform is obtained by nonlinear optimization on a set of points collected by the camera and by the forward kinematics.
